name: Return (Unicorn Studios)
description:
Return was made in less than 48 hours for the Alberta Game Jam 2020

Theme: After The Storm

All assets, sounds, and code were made during the jam period (apart from basic scripts and a few sounds).


Prologue

The world is ending and your last hope for survival is taking a spaceship to a newly colonized planet. During the long journey your ship encounters an error and the auto-pilot returns to Earth for repairs.  Upon returning to Earth you discover the horrific storm of events that has come to pass. You must gather resources to repair your ship, fight mutated creatures, and take off to the new world. Good luck traveler. 

Controls
  • Move: A & D
  • Collect/Interact: E"
  • Shoot: "Left MB"
